import React, {Component} from 'react' import Logo from '../parts/logo.jsx' import TeacherHeader from '../parts/teacherHeader' import bgimg from '../img/OMK.svg' export default class TeacherPage extends Component { render() { return (
) }} const bgimgStyle = { background: 'url('+ bgimg +') no-repeat right fixed', backgroundSize: 'auto 95%', width: '100%', height: '100%', padding: '0px', fontSize: '3em', }
